title: Average ticket price Orlando Magic ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006/07 and 2007/08.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 43.65 was reached at Year 2011/12
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 35.29 was reached at Year 2006/07
